channel.title: Erm i donno whats wrong, really
channel.description: hey everyone just wondering if i could get a bit of help for probably osme dumb and easy problem... :D erm i compile and rune my server, *note this is using vistex server*but it says: Please Screenshot this message, and send it to an admin! java.net.MalformedURLException "no protocol:" java.net.URL.<init>(Unknown Source) java.net.URL.<init>(Unknown Source) java.net.URL.<init>(Unknown Source) UpdateCache.getNewestVersion(UpdateCache.java:34) UpdateCache.run(UpdateCache.java:67) client.startUp(client.java:7522) RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) client.run(RSApplet.java:33) java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) - thats it... uhm note that a guy gave me a code and he told me to name it UpdateCache.java and put it in source. i put it in first folder in source... i dont know if i put it in the wrong folder place or what.. also he told me to go to client.java and search; void startup() and under the first { add; new UpdateCache(this).run(); and i did that but nothing really happened... help plz ill be refreshing page every 5mins

item.title: Erm i donno whats wrong, really
item.dc:creator: @AssassinsCRB AssassinsCRB
item.description:
@AssassinsCRB wrote:

Source>data, put the cache in their and name it as “cache”

Read full topic

item.title: Erm i donno whats wrong, really
item.dc:creator: @yojayojay yojayojay
item.description:
@yojayojay wrote:

hey everyone just wondering if i could get a bit of help for probably osme dumb and easy problem… erm i compile and rune my server, note this is using vistex serverbut it says:
Please Screenshot this message, and send it to an admin!
java.net.MalformedURLException “no protocol:”
java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
UpdateCache.getNewestVersion(UpdateCache.java:34)
UpdateCache.run(UpdateCache.java:67)
client.startUp(client.java:7522)
RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33)
client.run(RSApplet.java:33)
java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

thats it… uhm note that a guy gave me a code and he told me to name it UpdateCache.java and put it in source. i put it in first folder in source… i dont know if i put it in the wrong folder place or what… also he told me to go to client.java and search; void startup() and under the first { add; new UpdateCache(this).run(); and i did that but nothing really happened… help plz ill be refreshing page every 5mins

Read full topic
